    "option 5": "Fog Attenuation formula",
    "answer": "option 1: $L_{geo}=10log(\\frac{A_R}{A_B})$",
    "explanation": "The geometrical loss in dB is given by $L_{geo}=10log(\frac{A_R}{A_B})$, where $A_R$ is the area of the FSO receiver and $A_B$ is the area of the FSO beam at the receiver.",
